versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.1
versions.description: Initial public alpha version of BlackLogics. Basic drag‑and‑drop UI editor with foundational block logic system. Good for testing core features.

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.3
versions.description: Minor update focusing on internal fixes and preparation for feature rollout. (No official detailed changelog available, community releases on sketchub noted improvements.)

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.4
versions.description: Added widgets icons, preliminary **Web to APK export**, improved UI and other small enhancements based on community feedback. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.5
versions.description: May be final pre‑1.0 release. **Resource encryption**, **bottom sheet dialogs**, **UI overhauls**, improved **custom blocks**, **code generation upgrades**, and enhanced **AndroidX support**. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

description: BlackLogics is an advanced open‑source visual Android app builder that lets anyone build apps without traditional coding by using a logic‑based system and drag‑and‑drop UI editor. It supports AndroidX libraries, resource encryption, custom blocks, web‑to‑APK export, and full project management features. Continuous community input and Discord support keep it evolving.
